title: Hera
description: Hera is a multi-purpose Discord bot with plenty of features. Hera is coded in the TypeScript language using the **discord.js** library, mostly used for JavaScript Discord bots.

features.description: The bot has the following features:
features.commands: - **Slash commands**, the newest Discord commands implementation
features.funCommands: - **Fun commands**, helpful for the chat to not die and to express yourself with the funniest commands
features.giveawayCommands: - **Giveaway commands**, helpful to start a giveaway and manage it easily
features.activityCommands: - **Activity commands**, such as YouTube Together and Doodle Crew to entertain yourself and your friends in a voice chat
features.configCommands: - **Configuration commands**, which help with things like logging, and so much more...
features.musicCommands: - **Music commands**, which help you to play music in a voice chat
features.tickets: - **Tickets**, for those who are still using the legacy ticket system instead of the new Discord threads and forums

credits.description: These are the people which deserve credit for their hard work:
credits.discordjs: - **discord.js** -> Their library to communicate with the Discord API

activity.title: Discord Activity
activity.description: A temporary invite link has been generated to join {activityName} in `{channelName}`.

tutorial.title: How to join
tutorial.description: Just [click here](https://discord.com/invite/{inviteCode}) and you'll be able to join both the voice channel and the activity.
